items.title: Better than Heroku
items.content_html: After using Heroku for years to learn, I am sad to see the free tier go. While searching for another platform I found Fly.io. From their great guides (Migrate From Heroku), to their dev focused cli, it is better than Heroku. Oh, it also has a free tier for those hobby projects that I can’t quite finish.
items.content_text: After using Heroku for years to learn, I am sad to see the [free tier go](https://techcrunch.com/2022/08/25/heroku-announces-plans-to-eliminate-free-plans-blaming-fraud-and-abuse/). While searching for another platform I found [Fly.io](https://fly.io). From their great guides ([Migrate From Heroku](https://fly.io/docs/rails/getting-started/migrate-from-heroku)), to their dev focused cli, it is better than Heroku. Oh, it also has a free tier for those hobby projects that I can’t quite finish.
